abstract.t: The DECoupled Application Data Enroute(DECADE)working group is specifying standardized interfaces for accessing in-network storage from applications to store, retrieve and manage data. The main object is to provide a framework that is useful to the applications, including P2P applications and other data-oriented applications, possibly related applications that can benefit from accessing in- network storage. This memo focuses on some requirements such as request redirecting and so on which are on the central of mobility, wireless network environment and CDN application. We present these in this memo as additional requirements that should be considered for the DECADE architecture and protocol specifications.
